00051

00090 struct Range {
00091 
00094   Range() : min(0), max(0), inverted(false), pattern("") {}
00095 
00098   Range(int mn, int mx, int in, std::string p) : min(mn), max(mx), inverted(in), pattern(p) {}
00099 
00100   int min;
00101   int max;
00102   bool inverted;
00103   std::string pattern;
00104   bool every = true;
00105   bool none = false;
00106   
00107   bool isValid(int val) {
00108     if (every)
00109       return true;
00110     if (none)
00111       return true;
00112     if (!inverted)
00113       return (val >= min && val <= max);
00114     else
00115       return (val < min || val > max);
00116   }
00117 
00118   void parseRuleLine(std::string line);
00119 
00120   friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &out, const Range &r);
00121 
00122   // set that this ranges accepts everything
00123   void setEvery() {
00124     every = true;
00125     none = false;
00126   }
00127 
00128   // set that this range accepts nothing
00129     void setNone() {
00130     every = false;
00131     none = true;
00132    }
00133   
00134   // return if this range accepts all values
00135   bool isEvery() const { return every; }
00136   
00137   // return if this range accepts no values
00138   bool isNone() const { return none; }
00139 
00140 
00141 };

00169   /*bool inline flagCheck(Flag &f, bam1_t *b, int bamflag, bool inv) {
00170     
00171     if (!f.isNA()) {
00172       bool val = (b->core.flag & bamflag);
00173       if ( (f.isOff() && val) || (f.isOn() && !val))
00174         return inv ? false : true;
00175     }
00176     return true;

00178 
00179   Flag dup, supp, qcfail, hardclip, fwd_strand, rev_strand,
00180     mate_fwd_strand, mate_rev_strand, mapped, mate_mapped, ff, fr, rf, rr, ic, paired;

00184

00186   bool isValid(BamRead &r);
00187 
00188   friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &out, const FlagRule &fr);
00189 
00190   // set every flag to NA (most permissive)
00191   void setEvery() {
00192     dup.setOn();
00193     supp.setOn();
00194     qcfail.setOn();
00195     hardclip.setOn();
00196     fwd_strand.setOn();
00197     rev_strand.setOn();
00198     mate_fwd_strand.setOn();
00199     mate_rev_strand.setOn();
00200     mapped.setOn();
00201     mate_mapped.setOn();
00202     ff.setOn();
00203     fr.setOn();
00204     rf.setOn();
00205     rr.setOn();
00206     ic.setOn();
00207     paired.setOn();
00208     na = true;
00209   }
00210 
00211   // set every flag to OFF everythign off)
00212   void setNone() {
00213     dup.setOff();
00214     supp.setOff();
00215     qcfail.setOff();
00216     hardclip.setOff();
00217     fwd_strand.setOff();
00218     rev_strand.setOff();
00219     mate_fwd_strand.setOff();
00220     mate_rev_strand.setOff();
00221     mapped.setOff();
00222     mate_mapped.setOff();
00223     ff.setOff();
00224     fr.setOff();
00225     rf.setOff();
00226     rr.setOff();
00227     ic.setOff();
00228     paired.setOff();
00229   }
00230 
00231 
00232   // ask if every flag is set to NA (most permissive)
00233   bool isEvery() const { return na; }
00234 
00235 };

00299   void setEvery() {
00300     isize.setEvery();
00301     mapq.setEvery();
00302     len.setEvery();
00303     clip.setEvery();
00304     phred.setEvery();
00305     nm.setEvery();
00306     nbases.setEvery();
00307     fr.setEvery();
00308     ins.setEvery();
00309     del.setEvery();
00310     xp.setEvery();
00311     atm_file = "";
00312     subsam_frac = 1;
00313   }
00314   
00315   void setNone() { 
00316     isize.setNone();
00317     mapq.setNone();
00318     len.setNone();
00319     clip.setNone();
00320     phred.setNone();
00321     nm.setNone();
00322     nbases.setNone();
00323     fr.setNone();
00324     del.setNone();
00325     xp.setNone();
00326     ins.setNone();
00327     none = true;
00328   }
00329 
00330   // return if this rule accepts all reads
00331   bool isEvery() const {
00332     return ins.isEvery() && del.isEvery() && isize.isEvery() && mapq.isEvery() && len.isEvery() && clip.isEvery() && phred.isEvery() && nm.isEvery() && nbases.isEvery() && fr.isEvery() && (atm_file.length() == 0) && (subsam_frac >= 1) && xp.isEvery();
00333   }
00334 
00335   // return if this rule accepts no reads
00336   bool isNone() const {
00337     return none;
00338     //return isize.isNone() && mapq.isNone() && len.isNone() && clip.isNone() && phred.isNone() && nm.isNone() && fr.isNone();
00339   }

00341 
00342 };

00443

00445     size_t num = 0;
00446     for (auto& it : m_regions)
00447       num += it.size();
00448     return num;
00449   }
